title: Fort Stanwix National Monument: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       There are always many things to do at Fort Stanwix! Check often for updates to our schedule below:           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 12 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Fort Stanwix National Monument Awesome Artifact Adventure      Time: 11:00 AM to 11:30 AM Location: Willett Center Fees: Free!     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Monday Weekly & Every Tuesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/19/2016 to 09/05/2016 A fun and fresh new look at some of the objects on the grounds of Fort Stanwix National Monument! View Details      Fort Stanwix National Monument Daily Life Demonstration       Time: 1:00 PM to 2:00 PM Location: Fort Fees: Free!     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Monday Weekly & Every Tuesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/19/2016 to 09/05/2016 Explore what daily life might have been like for those that lived visited or traded at Fort Stanwix during this special living history demonstration.   View Details      Fort Stanwix National Monument Daily Life Demonstration       Time: 3:15 PM to 4:15 PM Location: Fort Fees: Free!     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 06/19/2016 to 09/05/2016 Explore what daily life might have been like for those that lived visited or traded at Fort Stanwix during this special living history demonstration.   View Details      Fort Stanwix National Monument Defending the Frontier       Time: 10:45 AM to 11:00 AM Location: West Lawn Fees: Free!     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 06/19/2016 to 09/05/2016 Fort Stanwix was created to defend the frontier of New York State. See a demonstration of the historic weapons that were used. View Details      Fort Stanwix National Monument Revolutionary War Encampment      Location: Fort Fees: Free!     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Saluting veteran's of every era, Fort Stanwix NM will be alive with the sights, sounds, & smells of the American Revolution for this annual Veteran's Day Weekend event. View Details      Fort Stanwix National Monument Walk Through Time      Time: 10:00 AM to 10:30 AM,2:00 PM to 2:30 PM Location: Begins at the Willett Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 03/28/2016 to 12/24/2016 Join a park ranger on this 30 minute program, walk through the park and imagine the people who made history in the Mohawk Valley before, during, and after the American Revolutionary War.  View Details      Fort Stanwix National Monument Yoga: Fitness Fun at the Fort      Time: 9:30 AM to 10:30 AM Location: Park Lawn Fees: Free!     Monday, August 15, 2016 Every Monday Weekly  from 06/27/2016 to 08/22/2016 Join the YMCA of the Greater Tri-Valley on the park lawn for this free fun Yoga series. Free to all attendees. View Details      Fort Stanwix National Monument Behind the Scenes Tour of the Museum Collections       Time: 11:00 AM to 11:30 AM,1:00 PM to 1:30 PM Location: Willett Center Fees: Free     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Every Wednesday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly  from 06/01/2016 to 09/02/2016 Learn from museum curators about what it means to preserve and protect the archeological resources found at Fort Stanwix.   View Details      Fort Stanwix National Monument Revolutionary War Sites of Central New York Shuttle Tours      Location: Fort Stanwix National Monument Fees: Free!     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Join us on a tour of Oriskany Battlefield and Steuben Memorial State Historic Site View Details      Fort Stanwix National Monument Zumba for Kids: Fitness Fun at the Fort      Time: 9:30 AM to 10:30 AM Location: park lawn Fees: free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Free fitness fun classes for kids! View Details      Fort Stanwix National Monument Fort Stanwix at the Great New York State Fair       Time: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM Location: New York State Fair Grounds, Syracuse, NY Fees: State Fair Admission Price     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Everyday  from 08/25/2016 to 09/05/2016 Join park staff, volunteers and partners at the New York State Fair Grounds, Syracuse, NY. View Details      Fort Stanwix National Monument Throwback Thursday 1916 at Rome Capitol Theatre      Time: 7:00 PM to 9:00 PM Location: Rome Cinema Capitol, 220 W. Dominick St., Rome, NY 13440 Fees: 10 cents     Thursday, August 25, 2016 In partnership with the Capitol Theatre and the Rome Historical Society, the park will host a 1916 night at the movies in honor of the year National Parks were “born.” View Details
